title.rendered: Anker PowerLine+ II Lightning Cable, MFi Certified for Flawless Compatibility with New Airpods, iPhone XS/XS Max/XR…

content.rendered:
Colour Name:Black

PowerLine+ II Lightning Cable
The Ultra-Durable Cable That’s Yours For Life

Evolved Durability
Withstand any twist, tug, and tangle with premium braided nylon fiber. And PowerLine+ II’s elite inside parts are constructed to final years, cost after cost.

Certified Fast
Boasts Apple’s MFi certification for Lightning cables, making certain splendid charging speeds for iPhone 8, 8 Plus, X, and another machine with a Lightning interface.

Pocket Perfect
Ideal take-anywhere measurement for charging on-the-go.

Creative Colors
Choose from 4 good colours: vibrant two-shade nylon braiding to match any machine, purse, bag, or room. Stand out from the group and simply spot your cable—even in crowded or messy environments.

A Cable for Life
We’re so assured in PowerLine+ II, we’re providing a hassle-free substitute for all high quality points. Not for half a 12 months, not for 18 months, however for a whole lifetime. It’s the one cable you’ll ever want to purchase.

Compatible Devices
iPhone X / 8 / 8 Plus / 7 / 7 Plus / 6 / 6 Plus / 5s, iPad Pro / Air / Air 2, iPad mini / mini 2 / mini 3 / mini 4, iPad (4th era), iPod nano (seventh era) and iPod Touch (fifth era)

Make certain this suits by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Staying Power: Lasts 30x longer than odd cables—confirmed in a laboratory surroundings to face up to 30000 bends.
Amazing Strength: One of the hardest cables ever created, with tensile energy able to withstanding 175 lbs.
Apple Certification: MFi licensed for flawless compatibility with Apple Lightning units, making certain the best attainable charging speeds.
Perfectly Portable: 1 foot of cable suits excellent wherever it must be stowed, whereas remaining prolonged sufficient to cost with ease.
What You Get: PowerLine+ II Lightning Cable, welcome information, hassle-free lifetime guarantee and pleasant customer support.(Travel pouch not included with 1ft and 10ft lengths.)
